content.rendered:
Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound
Transparency mode for listening to and connecting with the world round you
Three sizes of sentimental, tapered silicone suggestions for a customizable match
Sweat and waterproof
Adaptive EQ routinely tunes music to the form of your ear
Easy setup for all of your Apple devices2
Quick entry to Siri by saying “Hey Siri”
The Wireless Charging Case delivers greater than 24 hours of battery life

excerpt.rendered:
Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound
Transparency mode for hearing and connecting with the world around you
Three sizes of soft, tapered silicone tips for a customizable fit
